titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3133) to amend the Public Health Service Act to improve emergency medical services and trauma care, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-925.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/15/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3133 (emergency medical services).
